bibl.title: Demotic Petitioning.
bibl.note: I. Introduction. - II. Petitioning before the Ptolemies. - III. Petitions and related documents during the Ptolemaic period: 1. mḳmḳ; - 2. Demotic petitions addressed to the king?; - 3. ‘n-smy: Demotic counterpart of the Greek προσάγγελμα?; - 4. Other Demotic petitions?; - 5. Petitions and related genres; - 6. The disappearance of Demotic petitioning. - IV. Socio-legal context. - Pp. 65-68: Appendix I. [List of the] Demotic petitions; - 68-69: Appendix II. Other mḳmḳ documents. - Avec résumé en anglais.
